name: Fragile Nightmare
description: The protagonist is a lonely, fragile, mentally unstable person. He lives in an old, decrepit house, which is only suitable for demolition. His main problem is his fragile psyche, he hopes not to go crazy. Once, in the middle of the night, our hero wakes up because of a nightmare, he feels bad, he hopes to find his pills, to help him sleep peacefully. But there are no pills in their usual place, they have disappeared. This is the story of this little 2D horror that was made especially for Godot Wild Jam #44. Help find sleep pills for our main character, while trying not to go crazy.
